mapper.select: SELECT z.nickname as name, bx.bf as beforBalance, x.balance_after as afterBalance, IFNULL(am.addmoney,0) as addMoney, y.count as count, y.sumfee as sumfee, y.agentFee as fee, IFNULL(cs.ct,0) as downCount,IFNULL(cs.moneys,0) as downMoney, (bx.bf + IFNULL(am.addmoney,0) - y.agentFee - IFNULL(cs.moneys,0)) as theoryFee, (x.balance_after - (bx.bf + IFNULL(am.addmoney,0) - y.agentFee - IFNULL(cs.moneys,0))) as diff FROM ( SELECT agent_id, COUNT(1) as count, SUM(fee) as sumfee, SUM(fee * agent_discount) as agentFee FROM mp_order_all_agent WHERE apply_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND `status` = 3 GROUP BY agent_id ) y LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id, balance_after FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_agent_account_charge WHERE apply_date <= CURDATE() ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.agent_id ) x ON x.agent_id = y.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id, balance_after AS bf FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_agent_account_charge WHERE apply_date < DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.agent_id ) bx ON bx.agent_id = y.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id, SUM(fee) AS addmoney FROM mp_agent_account_charge WHERE apply_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND `status` = 3 GROUP BY agent_id ) am ON y.agent_id = am.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(f.addmoney) moneys,ct,ag.id FROM ( SELECT SUM(fee*agent_discount) addmoney, COUNT(0) ct, parent_id FROM mp_order_all_agent o LEFT JOIN mp_agent a ON o.agent_id=a.id WHERE apply_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND agent_id in (SELECT id FROM mp_agent WHERE parent_id !='0') AND o.`status`='3' GROUP BY parent_id ) f LEFT JOIN mp_agent ag ON ag.id=f.parent_id GROUP BY f.parent_id ) cs on cs.id=y.agent_id LEFT JOIN mp_agent z ON x.agent_id = z.id WHERE z.`level` = '1' ORDER BY y.agentFee DESC;

SELECT z.`name` as name, xb.balanceBef as beforBalance, x.balance_after as afterBalance, ad.addm as addMoney, y.count as count, y.sumfee as sumfee, y.providerFee as fee, (xb.balanceBef + ad.addm - y.providerFee) as theoryFee, (x.balance_after - (xb.balanceBef + ad.addm - y.providerFee)) as diff FROM ( SELECT dispatcher_provider_id, COUNT(1) AS count, SUM(fee) AS sumfee, SUM(fee * dis.discount) AS providerFee FROM mp_order a LEFT JOIN mp_provider_bill_discount dis ON a.provider_discount_id = dis.id WHERE apply_date >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND `status` = 3 GROUP BY dispatcher_provider_id ) y LEFT JOIN ( SELECT provider_id, balance_after FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_provider_charge_record WHERE apply_date <= CURDATE() ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.provider_id ) x ON x.provider_id = y.dispatcher_provider_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT provider_id, balance_after AS balanceBef FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_provider_charge_record WHERE apply_date <= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.provider_id ) xb ON y.dispatcher_provider_id = xb.provider_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT provider_id, SUM(fee) AS addm FROM mp_provider_account_charge WHERE apply_data >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(),INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND apply_data < CURDATE() GROUP BY provider_id ) ad ON y.dispatcher_provider_id = ad.provider_id LEFT JOIN mp_provider_physical_channel z ON y.dispatcher_provider_id = z.id ORDER BY y.providerFee DESC;

SELECT z.nickname as name, bx.bf as beforBalance, x.balance_after as afterBalance, am.addmoney as addMoney, y.count as count, y.agentFee as fee, (bx.bf + am.addmoney - y.agentFee) as theoryFee, (x.balance_after - (bx.bf + am.addmoney - y.agentFee)) as diff FROM ( SELECT agent_id, COUNT(1) as count, SUM(fee * agent_discount) as agentFee FROM mp_order WHERE apply_date >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND `status` = 3 GROUP BY agent_id ) y LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id, balance_after FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_agent_account_charge WHERE apply_date <= CURDATE() ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.agent_id ) x ON x.agent_id = y.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id, balance_after AS bf FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_agent_account_charge WHERE apply_date < DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.agent_id ) bx ON bx.agent_id = y.agent_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id, SUM(fee) AS addmoney FROM mp_agent_account_charge WHERE apply_date >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND `status` = 3 GROUP BY agent_id ) am ON y.agent_id = am.agent_id LEFT JOIN mp_agent z ON x.agent_id = z.id ORDER BY y.agentFee DESC;

SELECT z.`name` as name, xb.balanceBef as beforBalance, x.balance_after as afterBalance, ad.addm as addMoney, y.count as count, y.providerFee as fee, (xb.balanceBef + ad.addm - y.providerFee) as theoryFee, (x.balance_after - (xb.balanceBef + ad.addm - y.providerFee)) as diff FROM ( SELECT dispatcher_provider_id, COUNT(1) AS count, SUM(fee * dis.discount) AS providerFee FROM mp_order a LEFT JOIN mp_provider_bill_discount dis ON a.provider_discount_id = dis.id WHERE apply_date >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) AND apply_date < CURDATE() AND `status` = 3 GROUP BY dispatcher_provider_id ) y LEFT JOIN ( SELECT provider_id, balance_after FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_provider_charge_record WHERE apply_date <= CURDATE() ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.provider_id ) x ON x.provider_id = y.dispatcher_provider_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT provider_id, balance_after AS balanceBef FROM ( SELECT * FROM mp_provider_charge_record WHERE apply_date <= DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) ORDER BY apply_date DESC LIMIT 0,99999999 ) a GROUP BY a.provider_id ) xb ON y.dispatcher_provider_id = xb.provider_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT provider_id, SUM(fee) AS addm FROM mp_provider_account_charge WHERE apply_data >= DATE_ADD(curdate(),interval -day(curdate())+1 day) AND apply_data < CURDATE() GROUP BY provider_id ) ad ON y.dispatcher_provider_id = ad.provider_id LEFT JOIN mp_provider_physical_channel z ON y.dispatcher_provider_id = z.id ORDER BY y.providerFee DESC;
